{"id":612230839,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1641227339,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/612230839/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"42.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int trap(int[] height) {\n        int left = 0, right = height.length - 1, trappedWater = 0;\n        int maxLeft = 0, maxRight = 0;\n        \n        while (left < right) {\n            if (height[left] < height[right]) {\n                if (height[left] >= maxLeft) {\n                    maxLeft = height[left];\n                } else { \n                    trappedWater += maxLeft - height[left];\n                }\n                left++;\n            } else {\n                if (height[right] >= maxRight) {\n                    maxRight = height[right];\n                } else {\n                    trappedWater += maxRight - height[right];\n                }\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return trappedWater;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
